name: Penn And Teller's, Smoke And Mirrors
name_original: Penn And Teller's, Smoke And Mirrors
description:
This is a copy of Penn and Teller's, Smoke and Mirrors.
This game is for the Sega CD.
Penn & Teller's Smoke and Mirrors is an unreleased video game starring the magician duo Penn & Teller that was planned for release initially on the Sega CD in April 1995. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penn_%26_Teller%27s_Smoke_and_Mirrors
The game is famous for "Desert Bus". So much in fact a group plays this game for charity. "Desert Bus for Hope" https://desertbus.org/.

I upload this for media preservation and for anyone that wants to join in on the charity.
